Services

As a versatile developer, I offer a range of specialized services to help bring your projects to life. I'm available for freelance projects, contract roles, and full-time opportunities.

Full Stack Development

Comprehensive web and application development with both frontend and backend expertise.

  • Responsive web applications
  • RESTful API development
  • Database design and integration
  • Modern UI/UX implementation
  • Performance optimization

Cloud/Solutions Architecture

Strategic cloud infrastructure design and implementation for optimal performance and cost efficiency.

  • Microsoft Azure deployments
  • Scalable infrastructure design
  • Microservices architecture
  • DevOps integration
  • Security implementation

AI Development

Custom AI and machine learning solutions to enhance applications and provide intelligent features.

  • AI integration in web/mobile apps
  • Chatbot development
  • Data analysis and visualization
  • Recommendation systems
  • Natural language processing

Availability & Engagement

I'm currently available for:

  • Freelance projects (short and long-term)
  • Contract roles (part-time and full-time)
  • Full-time employment opportunities

I prefer collaborative environments where I can contribute to innovative solutions and continuous improvement.
